participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic with a passion for fast cars and sports.
participant_1.background: i have been working since i was sixteen years old. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. my favorite band is aerosmith. my favorite food is mexican food.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a love for art and literature.
participant_2.background: i am partly deaf. i'm a museum tour guide. i grow roses in my garden. i have a big library at home.
